Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Acute Myeloid Leukemia Therapeutic Gene Mutation Panel (FLT3, IDH1, IDH2, TP53) by Next-Generation Sequencing
Specimen Type: Genomic DNA (extracted from the submitted patient specimen)
Purpose: To detect clinically relevant mutations in the FLT3, IDH1, IDH2, and TP53 genes for diagnosis, prognosis, and therapy selection in acute myeloid leukemia.
Equipment: Spectrophotometer (Qubit or Nanodrop), TapeStation/Bioanalyzer, PCR thermocycler, magnetic-bead purification system, Illumina MiSeq or NextSeq sequencer, bioinformatics workstation
